alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 3:32AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral, and Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Several power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few gusts around 60 mph are possible, especially on the ridge tops above 3,000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
